text: Serge may refer to: *Serge (fabric), a type of twill fabric * Serge (religious), a ritual pole or tree of the Buryats and Yakuts *Serge (llama) (born 2005), a llama in the Cirque Franco-Italien and internet meme *Serge (name), a masculine given name (includes a list of people with this name) *Serge synthesizer, a modular synthesizer ==See also== *Overlock, a type of stitch known as "serger" in North America *Surge (disambiguation) Category:French masculine given names
title: Serge
